metadata.title: CVE-2019-14873 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the __multadd function of the newlib libc library, prior to versions3.3.0 (see newlib/libc/stdlib/mprec.c), Balloc is used to allocate a biginteger, however no check is performed to verify if the allocationsucceeded or not. This will trigger a null pointer dereference bug in caseof a memory allocation failure.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14873` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnewlib-arm-none-eabi - 3.3.0-1.3
newlib-source - 3.3.0-1.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: newlib package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.3.0-1.3').
